wiki.summary: “No Guidance” is the long-anticipated collaborative single between superstars Chris and Drake. The R&B record finds both artists tapping into their melodic sides as they sing about a girl who’s “got it.” The collaboration was initially teased by Chris on his Instagram stories and later previewed at a nightclub during Chris' 30th birthday party. wiki.content: “No Guidance” is the long-anticipated collaborative single between superstars Chris and Drake. The R&B record finds both artists tapping into their melodic sides as they sing about a girl who’s “got it.” The collaboration was initially teased by Chris on his Instagram stories and later previewed at a nightclub during Chris' 30th birthday party. Despite having been at odds previously—due to an incident at a nightclub in June 2012—the two artists reconciled in 2018 via Instagram and later on stage when Drake brought Chris out at his L.A. tour stop. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
